txt.en: 'This is very troubling, [placeholder]. I will follow this blood trail and try to find Glenneth. You must continue on without me. If this is as it appears, the Beornings are in terrible danger.'
The Beornings are lost somewhere in Eryn Lasgalen, north of the path.\n\nYou should find the Beornings.
You have found Langhár alone in a glade north of the path.\n\nYou should talk to Langhár.
After finding evidence that Glenneth was attacked, you and Thorlind separated. You must continue alone to find the lost Beornings before the same fate befalls them!
Langhár is being ambushed by wood-trolls!\n\nYou should defeat the wood-trolls!
Langhár is in a small glade north of the path in Eryn Lasgalen.\n\nYou should talk to Langhár.
Langhár stands alone in this glade

'So, the Elves sent you to find us? You are a friend, then. Good. Something took my brother, Sterkist. I... I think it may have been the Taurogrim. But those are just supposed to be a myth, meant to scare children away from the forest, aren't they? It matters not. Sterkist needs our help.'

#-1:[placeholder]'#-1:{Sister[f]|Brother}! The Elves sent you to find us? Something took Sterkist. I... I think it may have been the Taurogrim. But those are just supposed to be a myth, meant to scare children away from the forest, aren't they? It matters not. Sterkist needs our help!'
'This is our cart! Sterkist was here! The tracks lead to the East. We should hurry!'
'There is no mistake. These are the Taurogrim of legend. Why have they suddenly returned to Mirkwood?'
The Beorning prints continue in this direction
